be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.jadti
Class LeafNode

java.lang.Object
  be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.jadti.Node
      be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.jadti.LeafNode
Direct Known Subclasses:
LearningLeafNode
public class LeafNode
extends Node

A leaf node. A leaf node is a node with no sons.

Constructor Detail

LeafNode

public LeafNode(double weight)
Creates a new leaf node. The node weight is set to 1.

Parameters:
weight - The node weight.
Method Detail

goalValue

public KnownSymbolicValue goalValue()
Returns the most likely goal value of this node given its goal values distribution (i.e. the value corresponding to the maximum value of the goal value distribution).

Returns:
The most likely goal value.

getGoalValueDistribution

public double[] getGoalValueDistribution()
Returns the distribution of goal values. The i-th element of the returned array gives the number of learning items matching this node having the i-th goal value.

Returns:
The goal attribute value distribution. Can be null if no distribution defined.

setGoalValueDistribution

public void setGoalValueDistribution(double[] distribution)
Sets the distribution of goal values. This array is represented by an array of double. The i-th element of the returned array gives the proportion of items matching this node having the i-th goal value.

Parameters:
distribution - The goal attribute value distribution. Can be null to unset the current distribution.

getEntropy

public double getEntropy()
Returns the entropy of this node. This value reflects the certainty of the associated symbolic value.

Returns:
The entropy of this node, or a negative value if this value has not been fixed.

setEntropy

public void setEntropy(double entropy)
Set the entropy of this node. This value reflects the certainty of the associated symbolic value.

Parameters:
entropy - The entropy associated to this node, or a negative value to unset the current value.

hasOpenNode

public boolean hasOpenNode()
Description copied from class: Node
Shows if one of the descendants of this node is open. More formally, this function returns true iff this node is open or there exist one son of this node 's' such that s.hasOpenNode() == true.

Specified by:
hasOpenNode in class Node
Returns:
true iff one of the descendants of this node is open.

updateHasOpenNode

protected void updateHasOpenNode()
Description copied from class: Node
Checks if the return value of hasOpenNode() could have change. If yes, calls father.updateHasOpenNode().

Specified by:
updateHasOpenNode in class Node

replaceSon

protected void replaceSon(Node oldSon,
                          Node newSon)
Description copied from class: Node
Replace a son with a new node. The new and old nodes do not need to be modified, i.e. their father reference have already been updated.

Specified by:
replaceSon in class Node
Parameters:
oldSon - The son to be replaced.
newSon - The replacing node. This argument cannot be null.

son

public Node son(int sonNb)
Description copied from class: Node
Returns a son of this node. Sons are described by a number such that 0 <= sonNb < nbSons().

Specified by:
son in class Node
Returns:
This node's number of sons.

nbSons

public int nbSons()
Description copied from class: Node
Returns the number of sons of this node.

Specified by:
nbSons in class Node
Returns:
This node's number of sons.
